parameters.description: Electric field power spectral density (0-2 kHz), in 62 fixed frequency bins

parameters.description: Magnetic field power spectral density (0-2 MHz), in 59 fixed frequency bins of width 32 kHz

parameters.description: array containing ELF Electric Power and ELF Magnetic Power (0-2 kHz)
